original_text: And Ephraim their father mourned many days, and his brothers came to comfort him.
korean_text: 그의 아버지 에브라임이 여러 날 슬퍼하므로 그의 형제가 가서 위로하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Ephraim their father mourned many days
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 아버지 에브라임이 여러 날 동안 애곡하였고

sentences.original_text: and his brothers came to comfort him.
